story_summary: Mitya and Grushenka host a wild, drunken feast with peasants and friends, where Grushenka reveals her deep feelings and confesses her love for Mitya. As the party continues, Mitya struggles with his inner turmoil about his past actions and his love for Grushenka. The celebration is abruptly interrupted when police and officials arrive to arrest Mitya, charging him with the murder of his father.
